block.p: PARAVANT INC., Morristown, N.J., a maker of portable computers and electronics for the military, acquired Catalina Research Inc., Colorado Springs, for as much as $16 million.

CATERPILLAR INC., Peoria, Ill., the construction equipment maker, will increase its stake in ASV Inc., Grand Rapids, Minn., a maker of all-terrain vehicles, to 15 percent. Caterpillar will buy 500,000 ASV shares for $18 a share, a total of $9 million.

CB RICHARD ELLIS SERVICES INC., Los Angeles, a commercial property broker, and two rivals -- Jones Lang LaSalle Inc., Chicago, and Trammell Crow Co., Dallas -- agreed to invest $30 million in SiteStuff.com Inc., Austin, Tex., to create an Internet-based procurement business for the real estate industry.

SUMMIT BANCORP , Princeton, N.J., the largest bank in New Jersey, said a unit, Summit Commercial/Gilbraltar Corp., had acquired $130 million in loans and four offices from the United States division of the National Bank of Canada, Montreal. Terms were not disclosed.
